short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gets random show from online Watchcartoon! CheckBox and settings update

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Made to pick a random show at "onlinewatchcartoon" (wcofun.net)
It also allows you to autoplay it, you just have to put it on fullscreen (press "f")

Recent changes:
-Added random episode button.
-Added checkboxes to be a bit more selective.
-Added settings
-Added autoplay

contact me for suggestions!
